description: Default values for nm-vllm-production-monitoring. Declare variables to be passed into your templates.

datasource.description: Configuration for the datasource connecting prometheus and grafana.

httpMethod.description: The HTTP method to use for the Grafana prometheus datasource

name.description: The name to be given to the Grafana prometheus datasource.

timeInterval.description: The interval with which Grafana should scrape the prometheus datasource

uid.description: The uid to use for the Grafana prometheus datasource

url.description: The URL to use for the Grafana prometheus datasource

sidecar.description: Allows for deployment of containers alongside the Grafana container for purposes such as importing dashboards and datasources.

dashboards.description: Enables the automatic import and management of Grafana dashboards from ConfigMaps or secrets.

enabled.description: Enable the Grafana sidecar for dashboards so nm-vllm dashboards can be detected and loaded. If disabled, dashboards must be loaded manually.

datasources.description: Enables the dynamic configuration of datasources from ConfigMaps or secrets.

enabled.description: Enable the Grafana sidecar for datasources so the prometheus instance can be configured and used as a Grafana datasource. If disabled, the prometheus datasource must be configured manually.

grafanaDatasourcesLabelOverride.description: Label used by Grafana's sidecar for datasources to identify config maps with datasources that should be added to Grafana. Should match the value of the `sidecar.datasources.label` configuration in the Grafana chart.

grafanaDatasourcesLabelValueOverride.description: Label value used by Grafana's sidecar for datasources to identify config maps with datasources that should be added to Grafana. Should match the value of the `sidecar.datasources.labelValue` configuration in the Grafana chart.

nm-vllm.description: Configuration for the nm-vllm server deployment and service.

podAnnotations.description: annotations to add to the pod

prometheus.io/scrape.description: Enables prometheus to find pod to scrape
